title: BUZZ-UK miners: Bottom of FTSE after Investec downgrades
text:
53.00 -1.6500 
** UK mining stocks down 1.4 pct after Investec cuts its commodity price forecast due to weakness in Chinese demand 
** BHP, Anglo, Rio, Randgold and Antofagasta (Other OTC: ANFGF - news ) down 1-2 pct, top five FTSE 100 losers 
** "Evidence of further weakness in the Chinese economy ... has necessitated further downgrades to our commodity price deck," analysts say 
** Investec (LSE: INVP.L - news ) analysts double downgrade Glencore (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) to "sell" from "buy", and cut rating on gold miners Randgold , Acacia and Centamin (Toronto: CEE.TO - news ) to "hold" from buy" 
** PT cut on BHP, Anglo, Rio, Antofagasta, Ferrexpo (Other OTC: FEEXF - news ) and Lonmin (LSE: LMI.L - news ) 
** Largest percentage PT cut on Lonmin, down 60 pct to 35p; shares now at record lows of 41p 
** Centamin among top FTSE 250 losers, with 30 pct of its daily avg going through in the first 30 mins of trade (venkateshasoumithri.mamidipudi.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net)
